subject: Greetings!
msgSnippet: I m a new member, and I didn t want to *just* lurk around, so I ll introduce myself. I m an American man, in my forties, and have been interested in
messageBody:
I'm a new member, and I didn't want to *just* lurk around, so I'll
introduce myself.
I'm an American man, in my forties, and have been interested in
constructed languages (mostly because I thought they'd be easier to
learn than real languages - ha!) and scripts for quite a few years.
I don't really have anything substantial to contribute yet until I
can learn this script - so back to lurking for a while.

Terry Smithwick
TinyallenNOSPAMATyahoo.com
